models.description: Guest users represent unauthenticated visitors who can only view demonstration todos. These users have read-only access to sample content to understand application functionality without requiring registration or personal data collection.
models.name: todo_guest

plainFields.description: Unique session identifier for tracking guest browsing activity.
plainFields.name: session_identifier

plainFields.description: Timestamp of the guest's last activity for session management.
plainFields.name: last_activity_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session was created.
plainFields.name: created_at

models.description: Member users are authenticated users with full CRUD access to their personal todo collections. These users can create, read, update, and delete their own todo items while maintaining complete privacy and data ownership.
models.name: todo_member

plainFields.description: Member's email address for authentication and account identification.
plainFields.name: email

plainFields.description: Securely hashed password for JWT authentication.
plainFields.name: password_hash

plainFields.description: Current JWT session token for persistent authentication.
plainFields.name: session_token

plainFields.description: JWT session token expiration timestamp.
plainFields.name: session_expires_at

plainFields.description: User role for access control (member/admin).
plainFields.name: role

plainFields.description: Timestamp of the member's last successful login for session tracking.
plainFields.name: last_login_at

plainFields.description: Number of consecutive failed login attempts for security monitoring.
plainFields.name: login_attempts

plainFields.description: Account lockout timestamp after excessive failed login attempts.
plainFields.name: locked_until

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member account was created.
plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last account modification.
plainFields.name: updated_at

models.description: Core todo items representing tasks that users need to complete. Supports the complete todo lifecycle from creation through completion with essential tracking fields.

foreignFields.description: The member user who owns this todo. {@link todo_member.id}
foreignFields.name: member_id

foreignFields.description: Guest user viewing this demo todo. {@link todo_guest.id}
foreignFields.name: guest_id

models.name: todo_todos

plainFields.description: The primary task description using natural language. Supports up to 500 characters for comprehensive task descriptions.
plainFields.name: title

plainFields.description: Completion status indicating whether the task is finished. Defaults to false for new todos.
plainFields.name: completed

plainFields.description: Priority level for organization (Low/Medium/High). Defaults to Medium when not specified.
plainFields.name: priority

plainFields.description: Timestamp recording when the todo was created. Automatically set by the system and never editable.
plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp recording the most recent change to the todo. Automatically updated whenever any property changes.
plainFields.name: updated_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo was marked as complete. Only set when completion status changes to true.
plainFields.name: completed_at

models.description: JWT session management for member authentication and secure access control. Manages active sessions and provides secure authentication tokens.
models.name: todo_sessions

plainFields.description: JWT authentication token for secure session management.
plainFields.name: jwt_token

plainFields.description: Token expiration timestamp for session validity.
plainFields.name: expires_at

plainFields.description: Last time this session token was used for authentication.
plainFields.name: last_used_at

plainFields.description: IP address for session security tracking.
plainFields.name: ip_address

plainFields.description: Browser user agent for session identification.
plainFields.name: user_agent

plainFields.description: When the session was created.
plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp.
plainFields.name: updated_at
